on reading compounds: 芒種【ボウシュ】"grain in ear" solar term (approx. June 6, when awns begin to grow on grains)
芒硝【ボウショウ】sal mirabilis, mirabilite, sodium sulfate decahydrate, sodium sulphate decahydrate
光芒【コウボウ】beam of light
kun reading compounds: 薄【すすき】Japanese pampas grass (Miscanthus sinensis), maiden silvergrass, zebra grass
